entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Static SSR Edit Form two-way databinding not behaving correctly with nested types #59446
  • ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 10 #59443
  • Metrics for improved memory pool diagnosability #59442
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] First class integration with HttpClientFactory #59440
  • [Blazor] Communicate with a circuit instance from outside of the circuit #59439
  • Challenges in using WebApplication.CreateEmptyBuilder #59437
    Backlog
  • OpenApi doc is not generated at build time #59434
  • Add template for Blazor Web App with Web Api backend #59433
  • Perf improvement: updates #59430
  • NET9 - warnings on building Blazor Wasm project (WASM0060, WASM0062, WASM0001) #59429
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI not working with nullable property with MaxLengthAttribute #59428
  • [Critical] ASP.NET Core 9.0: AddOpenApi duplicates schema with a number suffix #59427
  • Check that HttpSys and IIS TLS support isn't impacted by obsolete members on ITlsHandshakeFeature #59426
    10.0-preview1

Closed

  • Hosting bundle do not uninstall old dotnet version #59202
  • Support Blazor .Net 8 Microsoft.Identity.Web client for Azure clients #51374
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: json #59410
  • Perf regression: single_query #59431
  • [Blazor] Cascading RouteData in Layout causes OnInitializedAsync to be called twice when navigating to another Layout #20637
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Access is denied - VS 17.12.3 #59342
  • [Blazor] MapStaticAssets incorrectly re-encodes files when running the published output in the development environment. #56742
    .NET 10 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Use a live crossgen2 for all builds #59447
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix loading dotnet user-jwts config #59425
    area-commandlinetools

Merged

  • Upload binlogs in default build scenarios #59445
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [Infrastructure] Script to automatically update Selenium and Playwright dependencies #59338
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24609.2 #59389
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use the Installers Arcade package to build the ref pack and targeting pack installers #59406
    area-infrastructure
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor.Decrypt flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Fix race condition in RedisCache when setting key expiration #59212
    bug, community-contribution, feature-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix: Include .webmanifest in Offline Cache for Default PWA Service Worker #59231
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/2.3] Fix Mvc.FunctionalTests referencing RazorPagesClassLibrary #59361
    area-mvc
  • Fix EventCountersAndMetricsValues and VerifyCountersFireWithCorrectValues flaky tests #59411
    area-hosting
  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Fix MultipartReaderStream synchronous read when using buffer offset #59422
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.Tests.Http2ConnectionTests.AbortSendsFinalGOAWAY` #59359
    area-infrastructure
